name: The Settlers III: Ultimate Collection
notes: Playback of the videos seems to be broken

files.settlers: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- settlers: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Settlers 3 Ultimate/S3.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: settlers
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
